results.title: Lionel Messi: Biography, Soccer Player, Inter Miami CF, Athlete
results.content: Messi, now playing for Inter Miami CF of the MLS, helped his home country win soccer’s biggest event for the first time since 1986, scoring two goals in the final and leading Argentina to a 4-2 win over [Kylian Mbappé](https://www.biography.com/athletes/a44651214/kylian-mbappe-net-worth) and France on penalties. *   [Club Teams: Barcelona, PSG, and Inter Miami](https://www.biography.com/athletes/lionel-messi#club-teams-barcelona-psg-and-inter-miami) *   [![Image 14: Lionel Messi in the 2022 World Cup](https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod/images/november-2022-qatar-lusail-soccer-world-cup-argentina-saudi-news-photo-1681319081.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.720xh;0,0.0794xh&resize=300:*)8 Celebrities Who Evaded Taxes](https://www.biography.com/crime/g43553371/celebrities-tax-evasion) ![Image 15: lionel messi, his wife, and three youth sons walk on a soccer field, all are wearing argentina national team jerseys and messi is holding up the fifa world cup trophy, behind them is a crowd in the stands](https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod/images/lionel-messi-of-argentina-and-wife-antonella-roccuzzo-walk-news-photo-1686171671.jpg?crop=0.910xw:1.00xh;0.0425xw,0&resize=980:*)

results.title: Lionel Messi Facts: Amazing Things You Didn't Know About the ...
results.content: * ON SI # Lionel Messi Facts: Amazing Things You Didn’t Know About the Soccer Legend Did you know these facts about soccer legend Lionel Messi? Lionel Messi. How many of these Messi facts did you know? ## **Early Life Facts About Lionel Messi** A young Lionel Messi in action for Argentina's U-20s. **4.** Messi joined his childhood club, Newell's Old Boys, at the age of seven, where he scored nearly 500 goals before making the move to FC Barcelona in 2000. ## **Career Facts About Messi** Lionel Messi. **6.** Messi scored 672 goals in 778 appearances for FC Barcelona, making him the club’s all-time top scorer. ## **Facts About Messi’s Personal Life**
